summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on August 27, 2009. The email discusses Epstein's whereabouts and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the communication may be privileged and confidential.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, reaching out to Jes Staley regarding his location.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

connections.description: Epstein is reaching out to Staley, suggesting a personal or professional connection.

keyFacts: The email was sent on August 27, 2009.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email discusses Epstein's whereabouts, specifically asking if Staley is still on a boat.
